channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- ceph
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- ceph

item.title: CVE-2018-10861|2024-09-16T16:28:46.914Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- ceph
item.description: A flaw was found in the way ceph mon handles user requests. Any authenticated ceph user having read access to ceph can delete, create ceph storage pools and corrupt snapshot images. Ceph branches master, mimic, luminous and jewel are believed to be affected.

item.title: CVE-2018-1128|2024-09-16T20:27:12.357Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- ceph
item.description: It was found that cephx authentication protocol did not verify ceph clients correctly and was vulnerable to replay attack. Any attacker having access to ceph cluster network who is able to sniff packets on network can use this vulnerability to authenticate with ceph service and perform actions allowed by ceph service. Ceph branches master, mimic, luminous and jewel are believed to be vulnerable.
